mapper.select: SELECT a.email, a.nick_name, a.phone_number, a.birth, a.address , a.name, a.gender, a.auth, a.regist_date, a.login_time , b.business_no, b.store_name, b.store_address , b.store_reg_date, b.hot_deal, b.store_call_number FROM member a LEFT OUTER JOIN master b ON a.email = b.email WHERE auth = 'MASTER'

SELECT a.email, a.nick_name, a.phone_number, a.birth, a.address , a.name, a.gender, a.auth, a.regist_date, a.login_time , b.business_no, b.store_name, b.store_address , b.store_reg_date, b.hot_deal, b.store_call_number FROM member a LEFT OUTER JOIN master b ON a.email = b.email WHERE a.email = #{email}

SELECT a.email, a.nick_name, a.phone_number, a.birth, a.address , a.name, a.gender, a.auth, a.regist_date, a.login_time , b.business_no, b.store_name, b.store_address , b.store_reg_date, b.hot_deal, b.store_call_number FROM member a LEFT OUTER JOIN master b ON a.email = b.email WHERE auth = 'COMMON' AND b.email is not null
